title: ヌル終端文字列
content:
[[=]]
,,**<<** [http://ja.scp-wiki.net/aiad-homescreen ハブ] | [http://ja.scp-wiki.net/alert-lockdown-initiated パート I] | [http://ja.scp-wiki.net/command-query-separation パート II] | [http://ja.scp-wiki.net/superencipherment パート III] | [http://ja.scp-wiki.net/clock-multiplier パート IV] | ##blue|パート V: ヌル終端文字列## **>>**,,
[[/=]]
----
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module css]]
.hover {
}
.hover:hover {
 	text-decoration: none;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.hover span {	display: none;}
.hover:hover span {
    position: absolute;
    display: inline;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    background: #FFF;
    border: 2px solid #34B;
    color: #000;
    padding: 1em;
}
.hover:hover span span {
    position: relative;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
}
[[/module]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
ではそれが君の公式見解なのか？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
今のところはそうだ。我々は破壊行為であるとみなしてはいないが……無論調査中だ。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
了解した。責任者にはそう伝えておこう。彼はサーバーが理由もなしに炎上することはありえないとの印象をお持ちのようだ。率直に言うと私も同意見だ。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
ハハ……。重要なことは、封鎖中は何も出入りできないということだ。だから事件のログがあったとしても他のファイルと一緒に消えているだろうね。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
では何が原因かは二度と分からないと？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
君がまだ溶け残っている部分を引っかき回して探してくれるというのなら歓迎するよ。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
結構だ。皆、インシデントがサーバー室でしか起こらなかったことにホッとしているだろう。データなら全てよそのバックアップから復元できる。

グラソンはどうした？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 30px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
いずれにしても彼は破壊された。

アレクサンドラは現在19サーバーにある17用スペースを担当している。ちょうどハードウェアを交換するまで、臨時のシンボリックリンクのようなものをセットアップしている。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
グッド。AIADは今のところ順調そうだ。サイト17の早期復旧にも貢献しているのだからな。最近出した予算要求がいくらか通ったとしても驚かないぞ。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
全くだ。それなら君の部署もGen5開発まで一直線だな。 
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
少なくともGen3よりはいい結果が出ることを期待していてくれ。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Gen3のことは//口に出すな//。//絶対に//。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
そうだな、すまない。

ところで、あれからアレクサンドラの行動はどんな様子だ？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
私の知る限り元気だ。ずっと忙しそうにしているよ。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
~~~~~~~~
[[div style="text-align: left; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #fff, #000, #fff);"]] 
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
[[/div]]
~~~~~~~~
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #009494; font-size: 3pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
.
[[div style="text-align: center; padding: 2px 20px; color: black; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #fff0f0; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px;"]]
::接続されました::
----
暗号化されたインターネット経路を確立
[[/div]]
.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: left; width: 100px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #933F65; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#933F65; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#933f65), to(#933F65)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#933f65, #933F65); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#933f65, #933F65); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
[[span class="hover"]] [[span]] 広い [[/span]] E5 BA 83
E3 81 84 [[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/crom_headturn_x_1.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
そうね。 
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/null-terminating-string/alex_shocked.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 100px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #933F65; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#933F65; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#933f65), to(#933F65)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#933f65, #933F65); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#933f65, #933F65); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
[[span class="hover"]] [[span]] 広すぎる [[/span]] E5 BA 83
E3 81 99
E3 81 8E
E3 82 8B [[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div]]
